title.narrative: CHILD PROTECTION SYSTEM HAS ENHANCED CAPACITY TO PROVIDE COMMUNITY-BASED SUPPORT

description.narrative: Child protection system has an enhanced capacity to provide community-based support services and measures targeting children deprived of parental care, children living in families experiencing multiple deprivations, and preventing separation

sector.narrative: Child protection focused on care and support for children with disabilities
Parent/caregiver education and programmes on violence, exploitation and abuse - across the life cycle
Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Social and behaviour change communication on violence, exploitation and abuse

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in North Macedonia (Child Protection)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2016 Macedonia: Evaluation of UNICEF Child Protection Programme
North Macedonia 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
North Macedonia Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Child protection system has an enhanced capacity to provide community-based support services and measures targeting children deprived of parental care, children living in families experiencing multiple deprivations, and preventing separation

description.narrative: Almost all children deprived of parental care now live in a family-like environment, while provision of tailored support and care was also ensured for children at risk. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:26/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of vulnerable children/chidlren without parental care in foster families
